AD_LathanderMural.synopsis: When clicking the lathander mural at the rooftop

AD_LathanderMural_0.speaker: Narrator
AD_LathanderMural_0.text: *The monks may be gone now, but their work endures. The Morninglord's light is still present in this image, and it feels like hope.*
AD_LathanderMural_0.context: NodeContext: when clicking on a mural of Lathander
